title: Tech Days coming to Russia
body: If you're anywhere near St Petersburg (the one with the palaces, not the one with dolpins) come to the TechDays event we're running next week. My boss (Jeet Kaul - pronounced "Cool", and he is) will be there, along with a pile of experts on a wide variety of topics from all Sun technologies. Three intense days of technology deep dives. Always fun and educational!
